com.jaxson.lib.gdx

Class GameConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaxson.lib.gdx.GameConfig

  • public class GameConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    A universal config file that can be converted to other config types. Such as AndroidApplicationConfiguration or LwjglApplicationConfiguration.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaxson Van Doorn

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PAUSE_ON_LOST_FOCUS
      Used in setBackgroundFps(int) to pause the Game on minimize.
      static int VARIBLE_FRAME_RATE
      Used in setMaxFps(int) to use a variable frame rate.
      static int VARIBLE_TIME_STEP
      Used in setStep(int) to use a variable time step.
      static int WINDOW_CENTER
      Used in setX(int) and setY(int) to center the window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameConfig()
      Constructs a default config.
      GameConfig(GameConfig config)
      Constructs from another config.

      Constructs a config from the arguments.

                  int height,
                  int fps,
                  int step)
        Constructs a config from the arguments.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the window
        height - The height of the window
        fps - The target fps of the Game
        step - The number of logic updates per second in the Game
